channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical Ltd. -- Ubuntu Advantage Desktop Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical Ltd. -- Ubuntu Advantage Desktop Pro

item.title: CVE-2024-6388|2024-08-01T21:41:03.306Z -- canonical%20ltd. -- ubuntu%20advantage%20desktop%20pro
item.description: Marco Trevisan discovered that the Ubuntu Advantage Desktop Daemon, before version 1.12, leaks the Pro token to unprivileged users by passing the token as an argument in plaintext.
